title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, February 17, 2022
description: Today is the birthday of science fiction writer Andre Norton (1912) who legally changed her name from Alice Mary Norton because she thought a man’s name would help her sell more books.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of science fiction writer Andre Norton (1912) who legally changed her name from Alice Mary Norton because she thought a man’s name would help her sell more books.
